title: 6 Festive Gift Ideas To Kickstart The Diwali Shopping This Year
text:
PARTNER

Diwali is just around the corner and preparations are on in full swing - right from the full-fledged house cleaning, shopping, stocking up on mouth-watering sweets, organising parties, and much more!

With all these festivities comes a task that most of us fret- buying gifts for others! It’s time consuming, boring for some, and thanks to the myriad of options available in the market, we’re spoilt for choice.

To save you all some time and patience, we made a list of 6 trending gift ideas that will make your friends and family beam with joy:

Go Green & Pick An Aesthetic Bonsai!

Petals

Nothing conveys love and positivity like a healthy green bonsai! It’s aesthetically appealing, compact, and definitely something that people love keeping in their homes. What’s more? A bonsai can live as long as a person, or even longer. Now that’s what we call a timeless gift!

Ethereal Everyday Jewellery

Want to gift something that leaves an indelible impression? Look no more - the Swarovski crystals are one of a kind, sparkly and sophisticated.

Glance through the vast variety of patterns Swarovski has - breathtaking crystals studded in pendants, rings, earrings, figurines, and much more. If it’s a gift for someone you hold dear, don’t even think twice and go for this option!

Waffle Maker

State-politics

If there’s one kitchen appliance that hasn’t been applauded enough, it’s the waffle maker! It churns out crispy yet tender waffles in a matter of minutes, is mighty affordable and super low on maintenance. If you’re feeling creative, pair a waffle maker with a handy recipe book, and you’re good to go.

Someone gift me a waffle maker already!!

Spa Vouchers

Unsplash

Here’s one thing we’ll all agree on - Diwali comes in high spirits but leaves us oh-so-tired. Having survived the dedicated cleaning, long Teen Patti evenings, and seamless socialising, all that one needs is some ‘me-time’. What better way to detox and shudder the stress away than hitting the spa! Believe me, this is one unexpected gift that is bound to touch hearts.

Statement Coffee Mugs

Pexels

What better way to start a day than a piping hot, frothy mug of coffee ! For all of your friends and relatives who like their routine brew, a high-quality coffee mug is a great option. Pick and choose between the classic cappuccino mug, the wider one for latte, travel mugs, the ones with funky quotes, and what not!

Choco-Love Hamper!

Prestige

What’s the one thing that people love unanimously and can almost never say no to? Chocolates! The idea behind this hamper stems from the same thought. All you need to do is collect a range of chocolatey goodies - right from donuts, hot chocolate mix, wafers to chocolate bars. Here’s a tip from the pros- slip in a handwritten note in this hamper to flatter your loved one! Ultimately, dress it up with crepe paper, ribbons, cellophane and bows, and you’re good to go!

With this quirky list of gifts, you’re sure to charm everyone. Happy shopping!
